item.title: Computer Setup Script
item.description: Putting things in scripts makes it easy to get up and running quickly. Devops isn’t just for servers or Dockerfiles, you can also use it for your own environment. This is the script that I use to get my Chromebooks up and running after a wipe and how I get a new Linux machine up an running. Lets use the bash boilerplate to write our script. I’ll update this later to include OSX.
